MAIN_MESSAGE: There is a power cut in the CH41 area of Birkenhead affecting properties in Dock Road and surrounding streets. We had no advance warning of this and only became aware of it at 6:47PM. Our engineers have arrived on site to investigate and repair the fault. Our team will work to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible. We now expect the power to be restored by 10PM. We will update this message if this information changes. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 7:37PM on 18th January 2021.
